thread.title: Eccentric Pendulum performs in Hyderabad
thread.title_full: Eccentric Pendulum performs in Hyderabad - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Eccentric Pendulum performs in Hyderabad
text: This Thursday evening, a Hyderabad-based band progressive metal band, Paradox Pulse and their counterpart from Bangalore, Eccentric Pendulum set the stage on fire with their performances. The high-octane gig that took place in a city pub saw Hyderabadis head banging and grooving the entire evening. After the opening sequence by Paradox Pulse, Eccentric Pendulum took the stage and was greeted by loud cheer from the crowd. The band that's travelled twice to Europe managed sure won some more fans from the city than they already had.
